text: Hostile Whirlwinds () is a 1953 Soviet movie directed by Mikhail Kalatozov.Идеальное непопаданиеВихри враждебные (1953) It stars Mikhail Kondratyev, Vladimir Yemelyanov, and Leonid Lyubashevsky. == Actors == * Mikhail Kondratyev as Vladimir Lenin * Vladimir Yemelyanov as Felix Dzerzhinsky * Leonid Lyubashevsky as Yakov Sverdlov * Vladimir Solovyov as Mikhail Kalinin == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet movies Category:1953 movies Category:Movies directed by Mikhail Kalatozov
title: Hostile Whirlwinds
